text: Jairam Hardikar was an Indian actor known for his roles in the Marathi language movies. ==Film career== Hardikar's notable movie roles were in the 1979 Marathi political drama movie Sinhasan directed by Jabbar Patel. He also acted in the 1978 Marathi movie "Sarvasakshi" opposite the late Smita Patil. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Indian male film actors Category:Male actors in Marathi cinema
title: Jairam Hardikar
